new texture
a pair of earrings that shader refused to add specular to, dunno why.wanted to add a matching neckless but max kept crashing on me so i gave up-.-
a misfitted wedding hat( had a dream it woul be light as snow, inocent looking with leaves as crown but instead it looks like a military hat with fishnet -.- but...
everything is option so u dont have to wear this things combined with dress.

u find this by the wagon right under the blacksmith in solitude,(theres a little wagon on other side of market) on the way to winking skeever., look on the ground.

u do what u want with this but leave a creadit that i made the mesh.

thanks theru


clippings ,handwrist
